amendment.description: An amendment numbered 103 printed in House Report 116-459 to reduce funding for EPA Science and Technology to match the President's FY21 Budget request.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 103 printed in House Report 116-459 to reduce funding for EPA Science and Technology to match the President's FY21 Budget request.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A010) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Smith (MO).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A010) Failed by voice vote.
